trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando o usuário alterna da origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The HiddenFieldDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: A classe HiddenFieldDesigner fornece suporte de tempo de design para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>em um designer visual.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>controle ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the control class name and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeHtml gera a marcação para um espaço reservado que inclui o nome da classe de controle e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres contendo a marcação usada para renderizar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"> </xref> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: O designer chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A inicialização e seus métodos base configurem propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>controle associado este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>
